website_summaries.verdict: Offers great protection and has pockets built in for stereo speakers. Quite lightweight, too.
pros: design cuts down on wind noise
pockets in unit for stereo speakers
cons: A bit larger and bulkier than competing designs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet, has to be one of the best ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet, has to be one of the best for the price. It is DOT and Snell approved so that's nice. It's not ECE certified as far as I know. The vents on it make a huge difference in having them open vs closed. The visor system is nice and switching shields is easy. It provides good airflow and has pretty good aero up to at least 115 as far as I can vouch. Its a bit of a bulky helmet all together but it fits well and has a nice strap. The cheek pads are easily interchangeable to get you a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler2 Sims

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured or described.
customer_reviews.text: It's honestly a great helmet and fitment matches most other helmets. The low review is because every picture shows a tinted visor and no where in the description does it mention the color of the visor. I figured that the helmet I received would simply be the one pictured. I received a clear visor not a tinted. I'm not happy about this because another visor is close to $40. Be aware that you will most likely get a clear visor not what is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Jusy buy it
customer_reviews.text: Really great fitting helmet. I got the medium and after a short break in it fits like a glove. The flat black looks cool and I have installed a bluetooth headset and there is plenty of room for the ear speakers. Visor is extremely easy to install and remove
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love the helmet...great for DOT needs. NOT Snell approved otherwise 5 star. Need to buy Snell approved for a lot of race tracks
customer_reviews.author: Louie g.

customer_reviews.title: Best price/quality you can get.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot be any happier and thankful with this purchase. Today I've had an accident at 25mph. I evaded an irresponsible pedestrian on the road, falling off my motorcycle. My head eventually hit the ground. I don't have any concussion and the helmet is fine overall. You can trust that this helmet protects you.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Angeles

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck! Great price for a snell approved helmet
customer_reviews.author: Shawn sommers

customer_reviews.title: the helmet itsself is great. DOT and snell rated
customer_reviews.text: the helmet itsself is great. DOT and snell rated. the only issue im having is that the shell is huge. although a medium, its the same size an XL. looks cartoonishly goofy when i have it on.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: It's very comfortable and the overall quality didn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I've been very impressed with this helmet so far. It's very comfortable and the overall quality didn't disappoint. My only complaint is I wish the air vents were a little bigger and would let in more ram air. Otherwise, no major issues at all. Changing visors is pretty painless and I bought a smoked lens right away.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Mapley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lid!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet! Better than the half helmet I did use. Less road/wind noise. Little to big in appearance than I care for but despite that is pretty lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Tank13

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I wanted it to do
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this helmet for go-karting and have loved it. Very comfortable, not too heavy but a bit large. However, for the price, I have no trouble accepting the size. The color is really cool and I get a lot of comments at the track about it. Please note, the helmet does not come with the tinted visor as shown. The clear version that it does come with works just fine at my indoor kart track.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have read many reviews that this helmet is loud.... this helmet is no louder than any other helmet I have had! Anyway, I really like this helmet and so do others that check it out. Lots of features for not a lot of money. I did add the photochromatic shield which I think makes this helmet even better!
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything I expected. Helmet arrived on time and undamaged. Note that the picture shows a tinted visor. My helmet was delivered with a clear visor. The helmet is light and well ventilated. Its exactly as described in the magazine reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Watanabe

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt ready to pay the high price for the high end products so I settled with this one. The helmet fit is great (for me at medium size). The wind noise is considerably lower than the $80 helmet I started with, but still if you're going to go for a ride longer than half hour, I'd highly recommend wear ear plugs, as this helmet will not keep it quite. Overall; its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: ~D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best helmet for the price. True to the size. Very comfortable and easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Bobble helmet
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer stated this thing looks humongous and silly on my head because it uses an xl shell for medium, large and extra large. I plan on returning it for another helmet. It also does not come with the tinted shield in the image, you have to purchase it separately.
customer_reviews.author: wholypantalones

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and comfortable helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first motorcycle helmet, so I don't have too much experience within this realm. However, the helmet keeps my head ventilated. I never get too hot with my helmet on, even in 90+ weather. Keeps my head nice and ventilated when I'm riding. The wind noise is so-so, it's definitely there. I do wish that the chin strap was not a snap loop system, but instead an adjustable plastic snap system. The looks of this helmet is a true matte black; it matches my matte black bike perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Yu-Cheng Chen

customer_reviews.title: Well built helmet. The air passages on top of ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built helmet. The air passages on top of helmet make the helmet look to big. I have had several people comment on how big the helmet looks when wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Jackson Jr

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this helmet
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this helmet. While it has a good number of vents, the vents themselves don't let in as much air as I'd like. It fogs up pretty easily on cold days when the visor is complete closed (even with all vents open).
customer_reviews.author: Joe W

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits excellent! I feel very safe and secured by it. The visibly is the best along with the ventilation system to keep cool. Over all great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexbrant88

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I really recomend this product. It is nice. It is perfect for my motorcycle. I like this helmet because it is confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Mancheno

customer_reviews.title: Picture is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! The helmet is totally sweet but the visor is deceiving. Clear when it is shown its black on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Gentry

customer_reviews.title: bell vortex helmet very loud and disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: bell should have named this helmet the hurricane. because that's what you hear when your riding over 10 mph. and it is giagantic! I paid $50 on craigslist brand new and want to sell it. If you wear earplugs, this is the helmet for you. I just used black electrical tape to cover all the vents. bell, this thing is a dud. hire another engineer. bell used to be good, now their competing with low end helmets. the girls bicycle helmets are pretty nice, I'll give them that. their $40 helmets, then they put the bell logo on it and sell them for $200.
customer_reviews.author: godzilla

product_meta.title: Bell Vortex Unisex-Adult Full Face Street Helmet (Solid Matte Black, Medium) (D.O.T.-Certified)
product_meta.description: VORTEX EVERYDAY COMFORT The Bell Vortex is every bit the helmet you'd expect of the Star's little brother. The Vortex features Velocity Flow Ventilation with Flow Adjust for amazing ventilation and temperature control, as well as Click Release-the reigning world champ in shield ease-of-use. TECHNOLOGIES: o Lightweight Polycarbonate/ABS Shell Construction o Velocity Flow Ventilation system with Flow Adjust o Click Release Shield for fast, easy and tool-free shield replacement o NutraFog II anti-fog, anti-scratch and UV protected shield o Padded Wind Collar drastically reduces wind and road noise o Contoured cheek pads o Removable/washable interior o Integrated speaker pockets o Padded chin strap with D-ring closure o Industry-leading Five-year warranty CERTIFICATION: Snell, DOT.
feature_bullets: Lightweight Polycarbonate/ABS Shell Construction. Velocity Flow Ventilation system with Flow Adjust. Click Release Shield for fast, easy and tool-free shield replacement
NutraFog II anti-fog, anti-scratch and UV protected shield. Padded Wind Collar drastically reduces wind and road noise
Contoured cheek pads. Removable/washable interior. Integrated speaker pockets. Padded chin strap with D-ring closure
